Token.Abstract: An RKMappingTest object provides support for unit testing a RestKit object mapping operation by evaluation expectations against events recorded during an object mapping operation.
Creates and returns a new test for a given object mapping, source object and destination object.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping being tested.

Parameter.Name: sourceObject
Parameter.Abstract: The source object being mapped from.

Parameter.Name: destinationObject
Parameter.Abstract: The destionation object being to.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new mapping test object for a mapping, a source object and a destination object.

Token.Abstract: Initializes the receiver with a given object mapping, source object, and destination object.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping being tested.

Parameter.Name: sourceObject
Parameter.Abstract: The source object being mapped from.

Parameter.Name: destinationObject
Parameter.Abstract: The destionation object being to.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with mapping, sourceObject and destinationObject.

Token.Abstract: Creates and adds an expectation that a key path on the source object will be mapped to a new key path on the destination object.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the sourceObject that should be mapped from.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destinationObject that should be mapped to.

Token.Abstract: Creates and adds an expectation that a key path on the source object will be mapped to a new key path on the destination object with a given value.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the sourceObject that should be mapped from.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destinationObject that should be mapped from.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: A value that is expected to be assigned to destinationKeyPath on the destinationObject.

Token.Abstract: Creates and adds an expectation that a key path on the source object will be mapped to a new key path on the destination object with a value that passes a given test block.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the sourceObject that should be mapped from.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destinationObject that should be mapped to.

Parameter.Name: evaluationBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block with which to evaluate the success of the mapping.

Token.Abstract: Creates and adds an expectation that a key path on the source object will be mapped to a new key path on the destination object using the given object mapping.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the sourceObject that should be mapped from.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path on the destinationObject that should be mapped to.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: An object mapping that should be used for mapping the source key path.

Token.Abstract: Adds an expectation to the receiver to be evaluated during verification.

Parameter.Name: expectation
Parameter.Abstract: An expectation object to evaluate during test verification.

Token.Abstract: Performs the object mapping operation and records any mapping events that occur. The mapping events can be verified against expectation through a subsequent call to verify.
Verifies that the mapping is configured correctly by performing an object mapping operation and ensuring that all expectations are met.
Evaluates the expectations and returns a Boolean value indicating if all expectations are satisfied.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if all expectations were met, else NO.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expectation against the mapping test and returns a Boolean value indicating if the expectation is met by the receiver.

Parameter.Name: expectation
Parameter.Abstract: The expectation to evaluate against the receiver.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to an NSError object to be set describing the failure in the event that the expectation is not met.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the expectation is met, else NO.

Token.Abstract: The mapping under test. Can be either an RKObjectMapping or RKDynamicMapping object.
The mapping under test. Can be either an RKObjectMapping or RKDynamicMapping object.
A data source for the mapping operation.
A data source for the mapping operation.
A key path to apply to the source object to specify the location of the root of the data under test. Useful when testing subsets of a larger payload or object graph.
A key path to apply to the source object to specify the location of the root of the data under test. Useful when testing subsets of a larger payload or object graph.
The source object being mapped from.
The source object being mapped from.
The destionation object being mapped to.
The destionation object being mapped to.
A Boolean value that determines if expectations should be verified immediately when added to the receiver.
A Boolean value that determines if expectations should be verified immediately when added to the receiver.
The managed object context within which to perform the mapping test. Required if testing an RKEntityMapping object and an appropriate mappingOperationDataSource has not been configured.
The managed object context within which to perform the mapping test. Required if testing an RKEntityMapping object and an appropriate mappingOperationDataSource has not been configured.
The managed object cache to use when performing a mapping test.
The managed object cache to use when performing a mapping test.
